description: A trailhead is a great place to start fresh. Keep moving with the Styk™ Men's Shirt. It’s cut from a lightweight nylon/polyester blend with a Tapered Fit to give you a modern look. Designed to wick moisture and protect from the sun, it also has mechanical stretch, so you can move freely and comfortably on your summer excursions. Hit the trail or the bar with your new go-to button down shirt.
name: Kuhl Styk - Mens
